mapper.select: SELECT o.id, o.order_sn, o.coupon_id, o.integration, o.member_id, ot.id ot_id, ot.product_name ot_product_name, ot.product_sku_id ot_product_sku_id, ot.product_sku_code ot_product_sku_code, ot.product_quantity ot_product_quantity FROM oms_order o LEFT JOIN oms_order_item ot ON o.id = ot.order_id WHERE o.id = #{orderId}
